attachments.title: Withings Unveils a Slick Fitness Tracker Disguised as an Analog Watch | Design | WIRED
attachments.text: Up until now, the marketplace for wrist wearables has been largely comprised of sporty-looking bracelets with a silicone finish. But today Withings, a French product company and early player in the connected health space, is releasing a fitness tracker worth coveting. Itâ€™s at once a sartorial throwback, and a step forward for wearables.
